name: unified-mcp-min-github
description: Implement minimal GitHub tool flow in unified-mcp

content: Add env var GITHUB_TOKEN (classic or fine-grained) with repo read/write as needed.
In shell before running unified-mcp: export GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_xxx

steps.instructions: Implement getGitHubTools() and handleGitHubTool() exactly as in the provided snippet (below).

steps.notes: Verify ListTools includes github_* tools. From your MCP client, call github_list_repos and github_create_issue.
